This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS move forward sentence boundary from middle of sentence 
PASS move forward sentence boundary from start of sentence 
PASS move forward sentence boundary from end of sentence 
PASS move forward sentence boundary from space 
PASS move backward sentence boundary from middle of sentence 
PASS move backward sentence boundary from start of sentence 
PASS move backward sentence boundary from end of sentence 
PASS move backward sentence boundary from space 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
